data.title: Pest Control Woodburn
data.meta_description: The Killers provides pest control services in Woodburn with over 30 years of pest control experience. Call us today for pest control!
data.text:
Pest Control

The Killers is the standard in pest control in Woodburn. Having more than 30 years experience in the pest control business, we have the know-how to recognize and create an extermination plan for any and all insects and rodents that infest the area. We have multiple plans to completely eliminate whatever specific pest control problem you have. Our total commitment to satisfaction and thorough, guaranteed work has earned us the reputation as the go-to pest control company in Woodburn.

Woodburn’s Trusted Pest Control

It is true, there are plenty of pest control companies in Woodburn and the surrounding area. Why chose us? Beyond just our reputation and many years of experience, we also guarantee our work for up to a year!

Here is just some of what we have to offer for your total pest elimination:

A full, free inspection by experienced, friendly exterminators.

A specific and detailed list of our pest control programs.

Guaranteed pest control that lasts.

A vast understanding of, and experience, with the pests that inhabit Woodburn and the surrounding areas,

A year-long guarantee.

A complete commitment to your satisfaction!

Your satisfaction is at the heart of everything we do. We handle an exhaustive list of pests that are common to the Woodburn area. If you notice pests in your home or office, don’t hesitate to call for your free inspection. The pests you can see are generally only a small fraction of the full extent of the infestation.

Here is just some of what we cover:

Pest Control, Woodburn

We have a reputation for open communication and excellent customer service. That is why our customers keep coming back to us and referring their friends and family to us. We give you a clear understanding of what pests we find in our initial inspection, and then help you find the right pest control package that fits your budget and your specific pest concerns. From there, your pest control is guaranteed!

Call today to ask any questions or find out more information about local pests or our pest control services. Our knowledgeable staff are happy to answer questions and share information with you.

Contact us today at (503) 981-2270 and find out how we can eliminate pests in your home or office. We are the pest control Woodburn knows and trusts!

Other cities near Woodburn where we do pest control include:

Salem, OR

Wilsonville

Canby

Woodburn, Oregon sits midway between Portland and Salem, the State capital. The original inhabitants of the area were a Native American tribe called the Kalapuya. Having a long history, Woodburn, Oregon has many historic sites and markers. It is also home to a beloved Woodburn Public Library where visitors can access local history records.
